botan.pubkey.pk_ops

PK Operation Types

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

interface Encryption;
Public key encryption interface

interface Decryption;
Public key decryption interface

interface Signature;
Public key signature creation interface

abstract const size_t messageParts();
Find out the number of message parts supported by this scheme.

Returns:
number of message parts

abstract const size_t messagePartSize();
Find out the message part size supported by this scheme/key.

Returns:
size of the message parts

abstract const size_t maxInputBits();
Get the maximum message size in bits supported by this public key.

Returns:
maximum message in bits

interface Verification;
Public key signature verification interface

abstract const size_t maxInputBits();
Get the maximum message size in bits supported by this public key.

Returns:
maximum message in bits

abstract const size_t messageParts();
Find out the number of message parts supported by this scheme.

Returns:
number of message parts

abstract const size_t messagePartSize();
Find out the message part size supported by this scheme/key.

Returns:
size of the message parts

abstract const bool withRecovery();
Returns:
boolean specifying if this key type supports message recovery and thus if you need to call verify() or verifyMr()

interface KeyAgreement;
A generic key agreement Operation (eg DH or ECDH)
